sqlMap.update: update user_account_kuaiya set phonenum = #phoneNum# where userid = #userId# and uuid = #uuid#
sqlMap.select: select ro.roomid as USERID, ro.theme, ro.noticecontent, ro.noticehref, ro.greetmsg, ro.greetmsghref from room_info ro where ro.roomid = #userId#
select count(*) from login_black_userid where userid = #userid#

select t3.userId, t3.contribution, 1 as roomSource from (select t2.userId, t2.contribution from (select t1.* from (select t.userid, sum(t.amount) AS contribution from gift_history t where t.dtime >= trunc(sysdate) - 7 and t.dtime < trunc(sysdate)
and t.roomid = #roomId#
and t.touserid = #roomId#
and not exists(select 1 from hist_xman_consume p where t.histid = p.histid and p.dtime >= trunc(sysdate) - 7 and p.dtime < trunc(sysdate)) group by t.userid order by 2 desc) t1 where rownum < 21) t2) t3 order by 2 desc

select t3.userId, t3.contribution, 1 as roomSource from (select t2.userId, t2.contribution from (select t1.* from (select t.userid, sum(t.amount) AS contribution from gift_history t where t.dtime >= trunc(sysdate) - 30 and t.dtime < trunc(sysdate)
and t.roomid = #roomId#
and t.touserid = #roomId#
and not exists(select 1 from hist_xman_consume p where t.histid = p.histid and p.dtime >= trunc(sysdate) - 30 and p.dtime < trunc(sysdate)) group by t.userid order by 2 desc) t1 where rownum < 21) t2)t3 order by 2 desc
sqlMap.insert:
select seq_consumehistory.nextval as histId from dual
insert into consume_history (histid, ntype, userid, amount, dtime, typedesc, product, count) values (#histId#, #type#, #userId#, #amount#, sysdate, #desc#, #product#, #count#)
sqlMap.select: select count(1) from user_info t where t.deviceuid = #deviceUId# and t.inviter is not null
sqlMap.insert: insert into temp_user_password(userid, origin_password, record_time) values(#userId#, #password#, #dtime#)

select seq_hist_kbi_to_showmoney.nextval as histId from dual
insert into hist_kbi_to_showmoney (hist_id, user_id, kbi, showmoney, status, update_time, to_user, note,appId) values (#histId#, #userId#, #kbi#, #kbi#,1,sysdate,#toUser#,#note#,#appId#)
